comment: He's funny and smart, and wants the best for his students. Also not bad on the eyes. Our assignments were fun and the tests and quizzes are all online through D2L. Big group project as a final. I highly recommend.

David Morgan is  one of my favorite professors that I've ever had! I enjoyed his class so much that I went to every single class even though attendance wasn't required. He is so funny, tells great stories, makes class interesting, and is easy on the eyes. He's very passionate about what he teaches and I really learned a lot in his class.
Super funny and has tons of life experience. He's traveled all over as an actor and has lots of stories. Be prepared to take an insane amount of notes. You'll need them and the book for the quizzes.

Professor Morgan is one of my favorite professors at KSU. I entered this class not knowing if how much I would enjoy it, but he made everything so interesting. He referenced a lot of popular movies to explain some concepts which I really enjoyed. All of his quizzes and tests are online which made it even easier to pass. He was great. Take him!!!!!!

Professor Morgan is great. He makes his lectures engaging and you can have a meaningful conversation with him about whatever you happen to be talking about in the theater. He is especially well versed in the horror genre. :D He has taught at a bunch of other universities before, but his humor and personality make him a great professor!
